summary: When a famous Shakespearean actor falls in love with a woman above his station, his professional and personal life begin to crumble.
cast: Ivan Mozzhukhin|Nathalie Lissenko|Pauline Po|Otto Detlefsen|Mary Odette|Kenelm Foss|Nicolas Koline|Georges Deneubourg|Albert Bras|Joe Alex|Jules de Spoly|Konstantin Mic|Pierre Mindaist|Laurent Morl√©as
title: Kean, el comediante
